channel.title: Error Connecting To Server.?
channel.description:
Right I Have A Source And Client.
And I have set up my No-Ip, and downloaded made a host and clicked the box to start running Bla Bla ...
When i run the server it all works fine untill i try and log in it takes 2 mins and then says 'Error connecting to server' i have tryed other courses and clients same thing.
i have opening the ports and i dont know what next !
Please post back :]
Thanks

item.title: Error Connecting To Server.?
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

if it’s delta, make sure the client is connecting to 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0 do not use your No-ip address.
To change the ip go to Client.java or Gui.java, just search no-ip, .com, .biz or simply “Server” until your find the server ip = *****

Read full topic

item.title: Error Connecting To Server.?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

Firstly, did you keep the Server Run Cmd up?

Secondly, you should change the IP the client you use to the No-Ip OR 0.0.0.0 OR 127.0.0.1 (last 2 are just default IPs)

EDIT: to change the IP you need to go into I believe is the Config file which is Client Sided and search for the IP of the original server

Read full topic

item.description:
@clarkie1122 wrote:

Can You Explain Futher Please ?

item.description:
@Fender94 wrote:

Is your Firewall blocking connections?
